Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID, Disability, and the Need for Timely Health Care Coverage.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Student, Kaiser Permanente Bernard J. Tyson School of Medicine, Pasadena, CA, USA.
Department of Health Systems Science, Kaiser Permanente Bernard J. Tyson School of Medicine, Pasadena, CA, USA.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Conflicts of Interest Dr Crosson discloses that he is the immediate past Chair of the Congressional Medicare Payment Advisory Commission (MedPAC). Nothing in this paper should be assumed to be a position of MedPAC or its current commissioners.
